name: Aurora Systems
overview: Aurora Systems Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and supply of microdisplays for use in mobile projector applications and high definition home theater projection systems. It offers three panel solutions, which include panels for three panel projection systems; and single panel solutions, such as single panel and color field sequential digital LCOS microdisplays, single panel phase modulators, and drivers for color sequential panel. The companyâ€™s panel and driver chipsets/liquid crystal on silicon solutions are used for projection applications in consumer electronics, industrial, aerospace, and mobile viewing platforms in Asia. Aurora Systems Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in San Jose, California with subsidiaries in Japan, China, and Taiwan. It operates as a subsidiary of OmniVision Technologies Inc.

acquisition.source_description: OmniVision Technologies, Inc. Completes Acquisition of Aurora Systems, Inc.
